(43) 311).The War Cabinet had a further discussion on the Man-power situation, a full record of which is contained in the Secretary'sv Standard File of War Cabinet Conclusions;'At the conclusion of the Meeting the Prime ministers aid that, in the light of the discussion, he would draw up a; seriesof recommendations, which he would submit to the War Cabinet, to govern the allocation of man-power up till the end of the calendar year 1943.(PreviousEeferencs:V-M. (43) 96thConclusions,Minute 3.)Offices of the War Cabinet, S.W.1,IQth July, 1943.
